src:
Fake News Buster: No visit to shrine after poll results
04 Nov 2019, 00:30 by Bangalore Mirror Bureau
THE CLAIM A video of Shiv Sena MLA Aaditya Thackeray is being shared with a claim that he visited Ajmer Sharif Dargah after recently getting elected from Worli constituency in Mumbai. SO, WHAT’S THE TRUTH? The video and image are at least four months old. The leader had visited the shrine in June this year.
text:
Fake News Buster: No visit to shrine after poll results
04 Nov 2019, 00:30 by Bangalore Mirror Bureau
THE CLAIM A video of Shiv Sena MLA Aaditya Thackeray is being shared with a claim that he visited Ajmer Sharif Dargah after recently getting elected from Worli constituency in Mumbai. SO, WHAT’S THE TRUTH? The video and image are at least four months old. The leader had visited the shrine in June this year.
